title: BRIEF-Huron Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.68
text: February 27, 2018 / 9:34 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Huron Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.68 Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Huron Consulting Group Inc: * HURON ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER, FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS, AND 2018 GUIDANCE * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $1.36 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 4.4 PERCENT TO $185.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.10 TO $2.40 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.05 TO $1.35 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 * SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 OF REVENUES BEFORE REIMBURSABLE EXPENSES IN A RANGE OF $720.0 MILLION TO $760.0 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.75, REVENUE VIEW $188.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.44, REVENUE VIEW $758.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
